title: Food, and having enough, creates a universal language (Iowa Farm Bureau Federation)
text: ( Source : Iowa Farm Bureau Federation ) Food , and having enough of it, creates a universal language. That was underscored for me recently when I attended the annual Iowa Hunger Summit , and during the luncheon, I found myself sitting between a
